title: Sanmina names Kurt Adzema its new CFO
text: Sanmina Corp. SANM, -0.36% said late Monday that Kurt Adzema has joined the electronics maker as its chief financial officer, succeeding David Anderson, who in January announced his intention to retire. Anderson "will help facilitate a smooth transition" and will remain an adviser to Sanmina's executive chairman through March 27, the company said in a statement. Adzema most recently served as CFO of Finisar Corp. Sanmina gota new CEO last month. The shares were flat in the extended session after ending the regular trading day down 0.4%.
